attributes.action: make the repossession of homes illegal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This stupid act causes more problems than it solves. Stop it and make the lenders come up with another way of dealing with it.
How many empty properties in this country?
How many homeless?
Yet another farce!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
